summary: A Dagger that has a 100% chance to instantly kill an enemy.
descriptionHtml:
There is a little known Daedra named Franz. Because he is to ashamed of his non fitting name he has never shown himself to a mortal being. When he heard of Mehrunes Razor he got jealous and planned to create a similar Dagger on his own, but with a much higher chance to instakill the target. When the Dagger was finished he dropped it from his Realm into Tamriel (Daggerfall :D) where it landed on the Talos Shrine in Whiterun (Heimskr is to busy blabbering nonsenes to notice).

This mod adds an retextured Glass Dagger that has a 100% chance to deliver an instant kill.

There is an additional Download with two Daggers looking like the Blade of Woe.

I made it with the enchantment because if you just scale the damage up it looks horrible and you get a ridiculous increase of the Weapon skill. 

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
- Franz for the Dagger of Instakill
author: xMaster2072

files.name: Dagger of Instakill Blade of Woe
